points.name: Golden Gate Bridge
points.bestTime: Sunset (for golden light and fewer crowds)
points.photoTips: Capture the bridge from Battery Spencer or Fort Point for iconic angles

points.name: Palace of Fine Arts
points.photoTips: Use the lagoon for reflections of the rotunda in your composition

points.name: Fisherman's Wharf
points.bestTime: Evening (for lively atmosphere and sunset views)
points.photoTips: Try a long exposure to capture light trails of the carousel and waterfront

points.name: Twin Peaks
points.bestTime: Sunrise or night (for panoramic cityscape views)
points.photoTips: Bring a tripod for steady shots of the city lights after dark

points.name: Coit Tower
points.bestTime: Early morning (to avoid crowds, with soft light)
points.photoTips: Shoot from the base for dramatic perspective, or capture the skyline from the top

points.name: Baker Beach
points.bestTime: Sunset (for colorful skies behind the Golden Gate Bridge)
points.photoTips: Walk to the north end of the beach for the best angle of the bridge; use a wide lens
